statements: SELECT * FROM body_mechanics_impact;
SELECT id, impact_description FROM body_mechanics_impact WHERE sport_equipment='Football';
SELECT body_area_affected, impact_description FROM body_mechanics_impact WHERE id=1;
SELECT id, sport_equipment FROM body_mechanics_impact WHERE body_area_affected='Shoulder';
SELECT id, sport_equipment, impact_description, body_area_affected FROM body_mechanics_impact WHERE id=2;
SELECT * FROM body_mechanics_impact WHERE body_area_affected = 'Legs';
SELECT id, sport_equipment FROM body_mechanics_impact WHERE sport_equipment = 'Football' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM body_mechanics_impact WHERE impact_description LIKE '%injury%';
SELECT id, impact_description FROM body_mechanics_impact WHERE body_area_affected = 'Shoulders' AND sport_equipment = 'Weightlifting';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM body_mechanics_impact WHERE impact_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT id, name FROM equipment ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, weight FROM equipment WHERE weight > 5;
SELECT id, name, impact_factor FROM equipment WHERE impact_factor < 0.5 ORDER BY impact_factor ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE weight BETWEEN 10 AND 15;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE weight >= 10 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name, impact_factor FROM equipment WHERE impact_factor > 0.5 ORDER BY impact_factor ASC;
SELECT e.name, bm.force_applied FROM equipment e JOIN body_mechanics bm ON e.id = bm.sport_equipment_id WHERE bm.angle < 45 AND bm.force_applied > 100 ORDER BY e.name ASC;
SELECT e.name, SUM(bm.force_applied) AS total_force FROM equipment e JOIN body_mechanics bm ON e.id = bm.sport_equipment_id GROUP BY e.name ORDER BY total_force DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT e.name, bm.angle, bm.force_applied FROM equipment e LEFT JOIN body_mechanics bm ON e.id = bm.sport_equipment_id WHERE bm.angle IS NOT NULL AND bm.force_applied IS NOT NULL ORDER BY e.name ASC, bm.angle DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM SportsEquipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM SportsEquipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SportsEquipment WHERE weight_in_kg > 10;
SELECT equipment_name, weight_in_kg FROM SportsEquipment WHERE equipment_type='Ball';
SELECT mechanics_id, mechanics_type, mechanics_description FROM BodyMechanics;
SELECT * FROM SportsEquipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM SportsEquipment WHERE weight_in_kg > 10;
SELECT se.equipment_name, br.mechanics_type FROM SportsEquipment se INNER JOIN BodyMechanics br ON se.equipment_id = br.mechanics_id;
SELECT se.equipment_type, br.mechanics_description FROM SportsEquipment se LEFT JOIN BodyMechanics br ON se.equipment_id = br.mechanics_id;
SELECT * FROM SportsEquipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC, weight_in_kg ASC;
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT id, equipment_name FROM sports_equipment WHERE impact_rating > 5;
SELECT equipment_name, impact_rating FROM sports_equipment WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM body_mechanics LIMIT 5;
SELECT biomechanics_study, body_part FROM body_mechanics ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, impact_rating FROM sports_equipment WHERE impact_rating > 3;

SELECT equipment_name, body_part FROM sports_equipment JOIN equipment_impact ON sports_equipment.id = equipment_impact.equipment_id JOIN body_mechanics ON equipment_impact.body_part_id = body_mechanics.id;
SELECT sport_name, COUNT(equipment_name) AS total_equipment FROM sport_type JOIN sports_equipment ON sport_type.equipment_used = sports_equipment.equipment_name GROUP BY sport_name;

SELECT sport_name, biomechanics_study FROM sport_type JOIN equipment_impact ON sport_type.equipment_used = equipment_impact.equipment_id JOIN body_mechanics ON equipment_impact.body_part_id = body_mechanics.id;
SELECT * FROM athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_age, athlete_gender FROM athletes WHERE athlete_age > 20;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM sports_equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Football';

SELECT athlete_name, equipment_name, impact_reading FROM athletes JOIN impact_data ON athletes.athlete_id = impact_data.athlete_id JOIN sports_equipment ON impact_data.equipment_id = sports_equipment.equipment_id;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_age, athlete_gender FROM athletes WHERE athlete_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY athlete_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM athletes WHERE athlete_gender = 'Male' AND athlete_age > 25;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_age FROM athletes WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM sports_equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Football';
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_age, athlete_gender FROM athletes ORDER BY athlete_age DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, sport_name FROM athletes JOIN sports ON athletes.athlete_id = sports.sport_id;
